column2: Merck agrees to settle litigation over Fosamax jaw injuriesUPDATE 1-Merck agrees to proposed $27.7 mln settlement over Fosamax lawsuits NEW YORK
column3: Dec 9 Merck & Co Inc said on Monday that it was prepared to pay $27.7 million to settle lawsuits by hundreds of people who sued the company over allegations that its osteoporosis drug Fosamax caused bones in the jaw to deteriorate.
